document.full_text: bahrain's largest opposition group urged saudi arabia to withdraw its forces and called for a u.n. inquiry into a crackdown on mainly shi'ite protesters that has angered iran and raised tensions in the oil-exporting region.
document.title: bahrain arrests opposition leaders
lines_and_colors: bahrain's largest opposition group urged saudi arabia to withdraw its forces and called for a u.n. inquiry into a crackdown on mainly shi'ite protesters that has angered iran and raised tensions in the oil-exporting region.
